S4 class BanksyObject

BanksyObject-class.Rd

S4 class BanksyObject

BanksyObject(
  own.expr = NULL,
  nbr.expr = NULL,
  custom.expr = NULL,
  cell.locs = NULL,
  meta.data = NULL,
  reduction = NULL,
  genes.filter = "intersect",
  min.cells.expressed = -1
)

own.expr(object)

head(x, n = 5)

Arguments

own.expr

own expression

nbr.expr

neighbour expression

custom.expr

custom expression

cell.locs

cell locations

meta.data

metadata

reduction

dimension reductions

genes.filter

intersect or union

min.cells.expressed

min number of cells a gene is expressed in (to be used with intersect)

object

BanksyObject

value

to be assigned

x

BanksyObject

n

Number of records to display

Value

BanksyObject

neighbour expression

Examples

d <- simulateDataset()
bank <- BanksyObject(
    own.expr = d$gcm, 
    cell.locs = d$locs, 
    meta.data = d$meta
    )
d <- simulateDataset()
bank <- BanksyObject(own.expr = d$gcm, cell.locs = d$locs, meta.data = d$meta)
mat <- own.expr(bank)
d <- simulateDataset()
bank <- BanksyObject(own.expr = d$gcm, cell.locs = d$locs, meta.data = d$meta)
mat <- own.expr(bank)
d <- simulateDataset()
bank <- BanksyObject(own.expr = d$gcm, cell.locs = d$locs, meta.data = d$meta)
mat <- nbr.expr(bank)
d <- simulateDataset()
bank <- BanksyObject(own.expr = d$gcm, cell.locs = d$locs, meta.data = d$meta)
df <- cell.locs(bank)
d <- simulateDataset()
bank <- BanksyObject(own.expr = d$gcm, cell.locs = d$locs, meta.data = d$meta)
df <- meta.data(bank)
d <- simulateDataset()
bank <- BanksyObject(own.expr = d$gcm, cell.locs = d$locs, meta.data = d$meta)
lst <- reduction(bank)
d <- simulateDataset()
bank <- BanksyObject(own.expr = d$gcm, cell.locs = d$locs, meta.data = d$meta)
vec <- clust.names(bank)
